channel.title: RSPS Making Guide Very Detailed
channel.description:
[size=12pt]No Ones actually asking, but when i made my source online on google, many asks how to make a server so heres the guide.
If you follow this step by step, your server is successful.
1. First go to http://www.no-ip.com/newUser.php and Create an Account.
2. Then log into your no-ip account from the website.
3. On the tab thing says "Hosts/Redirects | DNS HOSTING |abla|abla|abla" Hit Host/Redirects.
4. Click Add a Host (should be a orange button)
5. Where it says "HostName" put your wanted no-ip name to be like MoparScape, SymeScape, Monkeynoodles then you should see something called "zapto.org". Click the drop down menu you should see something like "no-ip.biz" "no-ip.org" "no-ip.info".
6. Pick anything you want, I will pick "no-ip.org" then scroll down do not edit anything else
and click
"create Host"
it will take you back to the host/redirects
you should see your new ip as the one you set
mine would be
"moparscape.no-ip.org"
NEXT
on the same website click logout(if you have not already)
next click download
then click on your operating system.
the rest of the thing is straight forward
Once you have downloaded and installed it
run the program then log in if you cannot see your ip right click on the blankness and press
"update checked hosts/groups now"
then it should show up
(if it does not recheck your username and ip and make sure its right if not go back to no-ip.com and check if you have made the host correctly)
YOUR NO-ip is set WOOOOOOT!
Next!
Make sure you got a source you can get one from from Server Downloads of this Website.
Then go to
http://www.utorrent.com/
and download utorrent (if not installed)
then 1. open utorrent
2.options > Preferences > connection
3. uncheck randomize port each start check (Make sure these are checked) Enable UPnP port mapping Enable NAT-PMP port mapping Add Windows Firewall Exception
4. where you see "port used for incomming connections: (box) Random port
change the number in the (box) to 43594 should be random numbers in there
5. hit okay then exit out of utorrent and shut it down
6. run no-ip
7. run server
8. run utorrent
then go to
http://www.google.com/?action=statuscheck
type in your server ip and click check if it says online then WOOOOOOOT!!!![/size]
All credits go to Syme, if you have problems, contact me at armor_wipes@live.com
[size=36pt]MODS, IF IM IN THE WRONG SECTION, PLEASE MOVE, THANKS.[/size]

item.title: RSPS Making Guide Very Detailed
item.dc:creator: @dds_ledg dds ledg
item.description:
@dds_ledg wrote:

Brilliant except when I do Step 6, 7 and 8 I get this Error. Instead of that Its Normally: LegendX is Accepting Connections. Very Nice Tutorial Though.

EDIT: Why did I just say that‚Ä¶ I Fixed I did do exactly as you said and according to No-Ip my Port is open but when others try and connect to my server it doesnt work. So basiclly I did what you said But I still cant see people.
This is an Awesome Tut Anyway

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Making Guide Very Detailed
item.dc:creator: @Syme Syme
item.description:
@Syme wrote:

[size=12pt]No Ones actually asking, but when i made my source online on google, many asks how to make a server so heres the guide.

If you follow this step by step, your server is successful.

  1. First go to http://www.no-ip.com/newUser.php and Create an Account.

  2. Then log into your no-ip account from the website.

  3. On the tab thing says ‚ÄúHosts/Redirects | DNS HOSTING |abla|abla|abla‚Äù Hit Host/Redirects.

  4. Click Add a Host (should be a orange button)

  5. Where it says ‚ÄúHostName‚Äù put your wanted no-ip name to be like MoparScape, SymeScape, Monkeynoodles then you should see something called ‚Äúzapto.org‚Äù. Click the drop down menu you should see something like ‚Äúno-ip.biz‚Äù ‚Äúno-ip.org‚Äù ‚Äúno-ip.info‚Äù.

  6. Pick anything you want, I will pick ‚Äúno-ip.org‚Äù then scroll down do not edit anything else

and click

‚Äúcreate Host‚Äù

it will take you back to the host/redirects

you should see your new ip as the one you set

mine would be

‚Äúmoparscape.no-ip.org‚Äù

NEXT

on the same website click logout(if you have not already)

next click download

then click on your operating system.

the rest of the thing is straight forward

Once you have downloaded and installed it

run the program then log in if you cannot see your ip
right click on the blankness and press

‚Äúupdate checked hosts/groups now‚Äù

then it should show up

(if it does not recheck your username and ip and make sure its right
if not go back to no-ip.com and
check if you have made the host correctly)

YOUR NO-ip is set WOOOOOOT!

Next!

Make sure you got a source you can get one from from Server Downloads of this Website.

Then go to

http://www.utorrent.com/

and download utorrent
(if not installed)

then

  1. open utorrent

2.options > Preferences > connection

  1. uncheck
    randomize port each start
    check
    (Make sure these are checked)
    Enable UPnP port mapping
    Enable NAT-PMP port mapping
    Add Windows Firewall Exception

  2. where you see
    "port used for incomming connections: (box) Random port

change the number in the (box) to 43594 should be random numbers in there

  1. hit okay then exit out of utorrent and shut it down

  2. run no-ip

  3. run server

  4. run utorrent

then go to

google.com

Google

Endlich wieder WM! #GoogleDoodle ‚öΩüåé

type in your server ip and click check if it says online then WOOOOOOOT!!![/size]

All credits go to Syme, if you have problems, contact me at armor_wipes@live.com

[size=36pt]MODS, IF IM IN THE WRONG SECTION, PLEASE MOVE, THANKS.[/size]
